targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.+"}[5m])) by (pod)
max(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", resource="cpu"}) by (pod))
max(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", resource="cpu"}) by (pod))

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", cluster="$cluster", container="ruler"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) / sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", cluster="$cluster", container="ruler"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)
max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.+"}) by (pod)
max(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", resource="memory"}) by (pod))
max(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", resource="memory"}) by (pod))
sum by (reason) (kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$job.+", container="ruler"})
sum by (job, strategy) (rate(prometheus_rule_evaluations_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, strategy) (increase(prometheus_rule_group_iterations_missed_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

(
  sum by(job, rule_group) (prometheus_rule_group_last_duration_seconds{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"})
  >
  sum by(job, rule_group) (prometheus_rule_group_interval_seconds{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"})
)
sum by (job, alertmanager) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_alerts_dropped_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Shows rate of alerts that successfully sent to alert manager.

targets.expr: sum by (job, alertmanager) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_alerts_sent_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Sent Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of sent alerts.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_errors_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_alerts_sent_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Sent Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to send alerts to alert manager.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_latency_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_latency_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_alert_sender_latency_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Sent Duration

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_alert_queue_alerts_dropped_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Shows ratio of dropped alerts compared to the total number of queued alerts.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_alert_queue_alerts_dropped_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_alert_queue_alerts_pushed_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Drop Ratio

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Streamed gRPC requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests, in quantiles

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

targets.expr: go_memstats_alloc_bytes{job=~"thanos.*", job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{job=~"thanos.*", job=~"$job"}
rate(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total{job=~"thanos.*", job=~"$job"}[30s])
rate(go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{job=~"thanos.*", job=~"$job"}[30s])
go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes{job=~"thanos.*", job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{job=~"thanos.*", job=~"$job"}
go_goroutines{job=~"thanos.*", job=~"$job"}
go_gc_duration_seconds{job=~"thanos.*", job=~"$job"}
